title: Agent Configuration Schema
description: Schema for defining AI agent configurations with YAML frontmatter and prompt content

name.description: Unique identifier for the agent (kebab-case recommended)

description.description: Detailed description of when to use this agent, including usage examples

model.description: AI model to use for this agent

prompt.description: The main system prompt that defines the agent's behavior, expertise, and output format

tags.description: Optional tags for categorization and search

version.description: Semantic version of the agent configuration

author.description: Author or maintainer of this agent configuration

tools.description: Tools or capabilities this agent requires
